def_en: In the time of the Roman Empire, a gladiator was a man who had to fight against other men or wild animals in order to entertain an audience.

def_cn: 勇士，斗士（指勇敢的或表演危险动作的运动员或表演者）
def_en: You can refer to a sports player or a performer as a gladiator in order to emphasize how brave or dangerous their actions are.
